thread.section_title: Babbel.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Babbel.com | babbel.com
thread.title: Annissa Hollenbeck

author: Annissa Hollenbeck
title: Annissa Hollenbeck
text: The courses are very helpful and the structure is nice. I like the review aspect and the different kind of courses. Although I do find that some of them teach you more of the language to be a tourist rather than to speak naturally and the voice recognition needs some work. Otherwise it is a very cool program with little mini lessons about why and when to use certain words and that is very helpful as well.
